name: Criminal Insects
description:
Credits

Created by Pablo Montijo with Assets from MSU

Instructor: Declan McClintock, Brian Winn

Major Modifications

1: Created Level One. Level One happens at the 'lab' or main building and serves as an 'exploratory' level to familiarize the player with the weapons system and the controls. The player gets to pick up weapons and heath items to be more prepared for subsequent levels. And finally, the player casually gets to shoot stragglers just for practice purposes.

2: Created Level Two. Level Two adds more challenges, expands the world, creates more enemies.

3: Created Level Three. Level Three is the Boss Fight. Added More challenges, but compensated with health pickups for game balance.

Minor Modifications.

-Modified Main Menu to include an Instructions Page

-Added Static Items in all three levels to help the player run for cover

Game Instructions

-Reach end portal of level 3

-Weapon pickups are available at the lab facilities

-Change weapons with the scroll wheel

-Shoot with left click

-Move FWD with 'W'

-Move LEFT with 'A'

-Move RIGHT with 'D'

-Move BACK with 'S'

-JUMP with Spacebar
